original_text:
for by wise guidance you can wage your war,
    and in abundance of counselors there is victory.
korean_text: 너는 전략으로 싸우라 승리는 지략이 많음에 있느니라

sentences.original_text: for by wise guidance you can wage your war
sentences.korean_translation: 지혜로운 지도로 너는 전쟁을 할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: in abundance of counselors there is victory
